definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a miniature rapid colour-photographing, enlarging-printing and developing conjoint machine.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種微型快速彩照擴印沖洗連體機。
